name: Harpie Lady Sisters
text:
You can Maximum Summon this card together with "Harpie Lady Sisters [L]" and "Harpie Lady Sisters [R]".
[REQUIREMENT]
Shuffle 2 WIND Winged Beast from your GY into the Deck.
[EFFECT]
1 face-up monster on your field gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if this card is in Maximum Mode, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.
